pr_title: [2.19.x] G-9102 Sort alerts by most recent

timeline.author: mojogitoverhere

replies.bodyText:
They share a name but are different functions; the one in UploadBatch.js is comparing by sentAt, but this change compares by when so there shouldn't be any impact.
Besides, the name is totally erroneous: these do not return comparator functions, they only return values. I would prefer renaming the one in UploadBatch too.
replies.author: brhumphe

replies.bodyText: Yes they use different values but the idea is the same - some date/time used for sorting purposes. I like that Comparator in the name implies that it is used somehow in sorting them, but I also agree that the name doesn't match what the method actually does so I'm on the fence. I'll leave it to your discretion
replies.author: mojogitoverhere

replies.bodyText: this rename seems to be causing other issues during the hero
replies.author: bdeining

replies.bodyText: Reverted the rename, kept only the call to sort()
replies.author: brhumphe

timeline.message: G-9102 Sort alerts by most recent
